apps.name: 3D Print Queue View
apps.desc: An app displaying the status of 3D print jobs for the Digital Makerspace, as well as an image carousel of 3D printed items. This view is used on the long wedge display next to the Digital Makerspace.

apps.name: Applied Learning
apps.desc: This site features selected examples of applied learning experiences as described by students themselves. Here you can browse through the dozens of applied learning projects in the Gallery and learn about the types of applied learning projects occurring at UNCW.

apps.name: Archives Special
apps.desc: Archives Special is the library's website for the University Archives and Special Collections that are a part of the library.

apps.name: Assignment Calculator
apps.desc: The assignment calculator helps students write research papers by generating a schedule for them - based on a date range.

apps.name: Cape Fear WWII
apps.desc: World War II: Through the Eyes of the Cape Fear External Website. It contains Art, maps, photographs of artifacts and interview transcripts document the important role the Cape Fear region's people played in the Second World War.

apps.name: Carousels
apps.desc: Makes carousel-type pages from sierra-db queries.  Used mainly by kiosks or iframes.

apps.name: Computer Availability and Stats
apps.desc: Displays usage data for computers in Learning Commons and the Graduate Computer Labs. A script on these PC's pushes login information to an API housed within this application. This app also can be used to see a detailed report on the total logins for each computer/region. Uses a script in the Yii apps pub lccomputer directory.

apps.name: Course Reserves
apps.desc: This app allows patrons to search for courses/instructors and see the corresponding reserved titles.

apps.name: DMS Main Site (Drupal)
apps.desc: This is the main web site for Digital Makerspace. It uses some iframes from the makerspace-api app: https://digitalmakerspace.libapps.uncw.edu.

apps.name: Escape Room (Tabula Rosa)
apps.desc: A virtual, choose-your-own-adventure library escape room, in which students attempt to solve puzzles to exit the room and end the game. This game is open to and marketed to all UNCW students and staff, but is especially heavily aimed at UNI 101, 201, and HON 110 students, who may be required to complete it by their professors. Students who need completion confirmation can fill out the completion certificate form at the end to automatically receive a certificate via Autocrat.

apps.name: Exhibits (Omeka-S)
apps.desc: Omeka is a free, flexible, and open source web-publishing platform for the display of library, museum, archives, and scholarly collections and exhibitions.

apps.name: Ex Libris Summon
apps.desc: Hosted JS file that allows us to use a feature from Third Iron in our installation of Summon

apps.name: Find It (Stack Map)
apps.desc:
A tool used for patrons to find the specific stack corresponding to their item. Stacks/Collections can be added in the administrative panel. The below URL is an example of a highlighted stack corresponding to Call Number pm83

https://findit.libapps.uncw.edu/stacks?callNumber=pm83&collection=General Collection

apps.name: In Training
apps.desc: In Training: Nursing Education in New Hanover County 1901-1966.

apps.name: Libapps Landing
apps.desc: A landing page for our Libapps server - used to test the status of Libapps, and to ensure something is being served at the root domain.

apps.name: Makerspace
apps.desc: The official website of the Digital Makerspace. This site is used to advertise the space, as well as offer management tools.

apps.name: New Bento
apps.desc:
Used in some part of Drupal7 bento -- sections "Journals, Magazines, & Newspapers by Title" and "Library Digital Collections".
For usage instructions, see the repo at https://libapps-admin.uncw.edu/randall-dev/new-bento

apps.name: Plagiarism Tutorial
apps.desc:
An app created by Tamara Ivins & OeL using Articulate Storyline for teaching plagiarism.
See readme at https://libapps-admin.uncw.edu/randall-dev/plagiarism-tutorial

apps.name: Popular Books
apps.desc: This application gives users book recommendation based on key themes. These books are found in the 'New and Popular' section. Users can text themselves the barcode of the suggested book using the linked Twilio application.

apps.name: Regional Art
apps.desc: The Visual Art Community of Wilmington & Southeastern NC: A Digital Exhibit

apps.name: Research Strategy
apps.desc: This interactive tutorial guides you through the process of taking a research question or statement and creating an effective keyword search. Guidance on searching for articles and books is also provided. Information including your search statement as well as books and articles you identify can be e-mailed to you after you complete the tutorial.

apps.name: scholars.uncw.edu (Vivo)
apps.desc: Faculty profiles project, pulling data from DigitalMeasures.

apps.name: The 1898 Foundation
apps.desc: Contains Interview transcriptions, histories, a bibliography to print and electronic sources, and links to associated websites.

apps.name: Twilio
apps.desc: An application used for sending messages/callnumbers via SMS. This application is embedded in the Popular Book application, as well as the Virtual Shelf application.

apps.name: URL Shortener
apps.desc: An application used for shortening links, similarly to Bitly or TinyURL. I.E. https://lib.uncw.edu/your-custom-url

apps.name: Virtual Shelf
apps.desc: An application used within the catalog for displaying neighboring items in a 'virtual shelf' interface.

apps.name: Application Inventory
apps.desc: The application inventory displays a list of Randall Library's applications.

apps.name: Archives Patrons
apps.desc: A report of patrons who have registered to visit Library Archives.

apps.name: Archives & Special Collections Transactions
apps.desc: An application used for logging visits to Special Collections and Archives. This data can be viewed in a report format.

apps.name: Barcode Lookup
apps.desc: The barcode lookup application allows people to upload a file containing barcodes and recieve information about those items. The audience for this application is GovDocs and Cataloging.

apps.name: Bento API
apps.desc: For use by Drupal9 bento search.  A json API.  For more details see:  https://libapps-admin.uncw.edu/randall-dev/bento-api

apps.name: Circulation Desk
apps.desc: An application used for logging visits to the circulation desk. This data can be viewed in a report format.

apps.name: Circulation Reports
apps.desc: Circulation statistics for checkouts

apps.name: Continuing Resources Report
apps.desc: A Sierra report of UNCW subscriptions - both physical and electronic, and their corresponding cash balances.

apps.name: Desk Links
apps.desc: A collection of forms/reports used for the Research Help Desk

apps.name: Duplicate Patrons
apps.desc: A Sierra report which shows patrons with duplicate email addresses.

apps.name: EMS Reservation Display
apps.desc: A list of displays which show events using the EMS API.

apps.name: Fund Report for Selectors
apps.desc: A Sierra Report which shows departmental funds for each fiscal year. This list also shows a detailed list of individual titles for the given department.

apps.name: Government Docs Clickthrough Report
apps.desc: This is a report application that shows the clickthroughs for government document links.

apps.name: Helpdesk (EResources)
apps.desc: The EResources ticketing system (OSTicket)

apps.name: Helpdesk (ITS)
apps.desc: The ITS ticketing system (OSTicket)

apps.name: Humidity Alerts Job
apps.desc: An application which sends alerts to respective people when humidity in library locations rises above 59%. There are currently five humidity sensors (SC1, SC2, SC3, MOWC, ARCH). *This also talks to the JobLog db in MasterDB*

apps.name: Humidity Data
apps.desc: A visualization of humidity data over the past month in various library locations. The current locations reporting humidity information are SC1, SC2, SC3, MOWC, and ARCH.

apps.name: Instruction Statistics
apps.desc:
This application shows statistics of RIS instruction.

Note: This was removed from yii-apps in January 2019

apps.name: Inventory (shelf-reading)
apps.desc: An application used to assist in shelf-reading. Also allows the user to track missing items in the collection. (Optimized for mobile)

apps.name: Irregular Patrons Job
apps.desc: This is a job which notifies Nicole via email and generates a report of patrons whose expirations fall outside of normal bounds. The job runs every morning at 8:30. *This also talks to the JobLog db in MasterDB*

apps.name: Items by Material Report
apps.desc: A Sierra report of item records based on their corresponding category type (Ebook, CD, Videorecording, etc.)

apps.name: Item Status Report
apps.desc: A Sierra Report which shows a list of items based on various filters such as billed, damaged, lost, etc.

apps.name: Job Notifier
apps.desc: Notifies developers via email if any automatic jobs fail to run on a given day. This job runs at 5:00 every evening.

apps.name: Libapps Landing (Libapps-Staff)
apps.desc: A landing page for our Libapps-staff server - used to test the status of Libapps-staff, and to ensure something is being served at the root domain.

apps.name: New Faculty Job
apps.desc: Sends an email to Stephanie, Steve, and Jason when new faculty is registered into Sierra. This job runs every morning at 1:00 AM

apps.name: No Results Job
apps.desc: An automated job that runs every Monday at 1:00 AM. This job generates 3 CSV files for Gary, reporting on the keywords, titles, and journals that yielded no results in the catalog search. This file is stored in Libstore

apps.name: OCLC to Bib
apps.desc: Accepts a text file of OCLC numbers (one per line).  Returns a csv of [Bib, Oclc].

apps.name: Overdue Items Search List
apps.desc: A Sierra Report which shows a list of overdue items for a given date range.

apps.name: Price List
apps.desc: A Sierra Report which shows items with a price of zero that are due within a specified date range.

apps.name: PRSE Evaluations
apps.desc: Electronic form for staff evaluations.

apps.name: Purchase Requests Job
apps.desc: This is a job that notifies patrons who have opted in when an item they have requested arrive. The job runs at 5:00 every evening.

apps.name: Randall Art Inventory
apps.desc: The Randall Art Inventory Application displays the available artwork in the Randall Library Collection.  Through it, one can request to checkout a piece.

apps.name: Randall Reports
apps.desc: An umbrella application that houses applications used by SC and Circulation for displaying reports.

apps.name: Randall Staff Report Links
apps.desc: A list of reports that once lived on RandallStaff. These links now point to their new location on Libapps-staff.

apps.name: Reference Transactions
apps.desc: An application used for logging visits to Reference Help Desk. This data can be viewed in a report format.

apps.name: Remote Reference Statistics
apps.desc:
Also called Randall Library Consultations and Remote Reference.
An application used for logging consultations and remote reference. This data can be viewed in a report format.

apps.name: Rotation Displays
apps.desc: An application for managing images for the rotating displays near the Circ Desk, in Learning Commons, Kiosk, and GovDocs.

apps.name: Sierra Reports
apps.desc: An umbrella application which houses several Sierra-based reports.

apps.name: Special Collections Patrons
apps.desc: This application is used to track visits to Special Collections.

apps.name: Staff Site
apps.desc: Randall Staff website for forms, surveys, evaluations, etc.

apps.name: Strategic Plan Tracker
apps.desc: An application used for tracking progress on the Randall Library Strategic Plan. The progress within various categories is also rendered as a graph for better visualization.

apps.name: Summon Deletes Job
apps.desc: This is a job which generates a file of records and places it on the Summon ftp server. These items are removed from summons. This job runs every morning at 1:00.

apps.name: Summon Deletes Report
apps.desc: A Sierra Report which shows a list of items removed from the Summons Deletes process on given days.

apps.name: Summon Updates Job
apps.desc: This job generates a file of records that is placed on the Summon ftp server. These records are updated in Summon. This job runs every morning at 1:00.

apps.name: TAC Circ Job
apps.desc: A node.js job that runs daily at 1am.  It writes to a database used by TAC Circ Reports app.  This job must run once every day, else statistics will be skewed.

apps.name: TAC Circulation Reports
apps.desc: This is a reporting application used by TAC for tracking circulation desk transactions. It is also used for viewing TAC items and their current status.

apps.name: Track Login API
apps.desc: An API with a single POST route for tracking usage across various applications. Stores login information into ApplicationUsage on Master DB

apps.name: Transfers item-search frontend
apps.desc: TAC/circ use this webapp to mark items as "Searched".  It passes that message to the transfers job via writing to the transfers db.

apps.name: Transfers of Fines and Fees Job
apps.desc: This is an automatic job used in conjunction with Jason's manual processes that assists with the transfer of fines and fees to student accounts. This job must be run every day (along with Jason's manual processes). This is a high-risk application, and failure of certain processes can result in duplicate/missing charges, as well as student confusion (automatic emails).

apps.name: Yii Apps
apps.desc: An umbrella application that houses applications build with the PHP framework Yii.

servers.name: randallwebvm.uncw.edu
servers.desc: Server containing our main library website and important sub sites

apps.name: Build
apps.desc: BUILD (Beginning Undergraduate Information Literacy Development) consists of 6 modules designed to help you learn important information literacy skills.

apps.name: Clickheat
apps.desc: Ann application that shows where people are pressing on our touchkiosk application.

apps.name: Deselection
apps.desc: Go to https://library.uncw.edu/deselection to view the list and provide feedback. Login with your UNCW login and password. Click a Library of Congress class letter to get the title lists. Click on a title for more details and/or to comment.

apps.name: Group Study Availability
apps.desc:
A view for displaying availability for the group study rooms. Not currently in use. Normally lives on the kiosk near the group study rooms. Also lives at https://library.uncw.edu/group_study_availability_info_kiosk/
Tied to:  https://library.uncw.edu/room_reservations

apps.name: Main Library Site
apps.desc: The main library website

apps.name: New Titles RSS Feed Generator
apps.desc: This is a set of 5 scripts that generates RSS feeds for new books, music, and videos that have been recently added to the UNCW library. The script actually reside on the main library site: library.uncw.edu.

apps.name: Randall Map Application
apps.desc: Floormaps on library.uncw.edu

servers.name: libpharos01.uncw.edu
servers.desc: Guest computer sign-in server, web app for circ use for monitoring and adding/removing users, admin and reporting software for the Pharos sign up system

servers.name: illiad.uncw.edu
servers.desc: Illiad interlibrary loan software and apps

apps.name: Illiad ILL
apps.desc: Illiad interlibrary loan software and apps

servers.name: itslibpp01.uncw.edu
servers.desc: PastPerfect Museum software server and database

apps.name: PastPerfect
apps.desc: PastPerfect Museum software server and database

apps.name: Catalog
apps.desc: The library catalogue search.
